984610.name: Mech Merc Company
984610.description:
This is a failed early access game being released as freeware.

Mech Merc Company is a 90s-style mech combat simulator with business management elements. Buy and sell mechs, customize your mechs, hire and fire AI pilots, manage your business expenses, and complete tactical objective-based missions.

Features

- Pilot your massive combat mechs in combat missions.

- Customize your mechs with the expansive selection of weapons and equipment.

- 21 playable mechs.

- Run your own mechanized mercenary company.

- Choose contracts and complete missions to make money.

- Buy and sell mechs and equipment.

- Salvage mechs and equipment from missions.

- Hire AI pilots to assist in missions.

- Take up to 12 mechs on missions.
